channel.title: Soundtrack on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Mícheál Keating - Out of Place OST
item.description: Composition, Production, Mix, Guitar, Bass, Synth, Drum Programming, Violin, Accordion Hear it on Bandcamp Original Score for Féile na Gréine’s documentary film ‘Out of Place’ “This is a pinhole view capturing a passing moment. The story is neither polished or neat, it is rough and taped together at the seams, fragmented and utterly incomplete. Featuring performances from Denise Chaila, God Knows, Hey Rusty, His Father’s Voice, MuRli, and Post Punk Podge & the Technohippies, OUT OF PLACE is an intimate portrayal of a local music scene, capturing the incredible diversity of cultural activity happening in Limerick City.
